attributes.additional_details: As  tax payer , as residents, as human beings we need to have our questions answered.
attributes.background:
Me and the rest of 3.6 milion people from the EU need to have reassurance from the Government.
We need to have our situation explained clearly as many of us ate thinking to go back home as we are not wanted over here.
We are not bargain chips, we are not just numbers and we are not livestock.
